name: Swerve: The Impossible Drive - Racing Game
name_original: Swerve: The Impossible Drive - Racing Game
description:
Outrun the cops and outdrive the traffic!

Test your driving skills with these exotic cars.

Skip from lane to lane to dodge traffic as you collect coins to unlock cars.
____________________________________________

• Endless gameplay
• 15 supercars
• Simple arcade game for all ages
____________________________________________

Swipe control makes game easy to play.

Gameplay becomes more and more challenging as you progress.

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!
